languages.text: "Странно... голосочки заткнулись. Только хихикают тихо, когда вы что-то трогаете. Может, вернемся и вымоем руки с мылом раз десять?"
"Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"
languages.original_text: "Странно... голосочки заткнулись. Только хихикают тихо, когда вы что-то трогаете. Может, вернемся и вымоем руки с мылом раз десять?"

traits.locale_text: "Odd... the little voices have shut up. All they're doing now is giggling quietly every time you touch something. Perhaps we might go back and wash our hands with soap ten times over?"
"Odd... the little voices have shut up. All they're doing now is giggling quietly every time you touch something. Perhaps we might go back and wash our hands with soap ten times over?"
"How odd... the little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"
"How odd... the little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"
"Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"
"Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"

languages.text: «Qué raro... mis vocecillas se han callado. Ahora solo se ríen por lo bajo cada vez que se acerca a algo. ¿Y si nos vamos y nos lavamos las manos con jabón diez veces, por lo menos?».
languages.original_text: "Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"

traits.locale_text: «Qué raro... mis vocecillas se han callado. Ahora solo se ríen por lo bajo cada vez que se acerca a algo. ¿Y si nos vamos y nos lavamos las manos con jabón diez veces, por lo menos?».

languages.text: 「奇妙ね…私の小さな声が黙ってしまったわ。今は、あなたが何かに触ろうとするたびに、静かにクスクス笑ってるだけ。戻って、10回ぐらい石鹸で手を洗わない？」
languages.original_text: "Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"

traits.locale_text: 「奇妙ね…私の小さな声が黙ってしまったわ。今は、あなたが何かに触ろうとするたびに、静かにクスクス笑ってるだけ。戻って、10回ぐらい石鹸で手を洗わない？」

languages.text: “真奇怪……那些小小的低语声安静下来了。只有当你碰这里的东西时，它们才会咯咯发笑。不如我们现在就回去，用肥皂洗十遍手吧？”
languages.original_text: "Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"

traits.locale_text: “真奇怪……那些小小的低语声安静下来了。只有当你碰这里的东西时，它们才会咯咯发笑。不如我们现在就回去，用肥皂洗十遍手吧？”

languages.text: "Merkwürdig ... meine kleinen Stimmen sind verstummt. Jetzt kichern sie nur noch leise, wann immer Ihr etwas berührt. Warum gehen wir nicht zurück und waschen unsere Hände zehnmal mit Seife oder so?"
languages.original_text: "Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"

traits.locale_text: "Merkwürdig ... meine kleinen Stimmen sind verstummt. Jetzt kichern sie nur noch leise, wann immer Ihr etwas berührt. Warum gehen wir nicht zurück und waschen unsere Hände zehnmal mit Seife oder so?"

languages.text: « Étrange... Mes petites voix se sont tues. Elles se contentent de ricaner chaque fois que vous touchez à quelque chose. Et si on rentrait ? Je pense qu'il faudrait aussi qu'on se lave les mains une bonne dizaine de fois. Si ce n'est plus. »
languages.original_text: "Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"

traits.locale_text: « Étrange... Mes petites voix se sont tues. Elles se contentent de ricaner chaque fois que vous touchez à quelque chose. Et si on rentrait ? Je pense qu'il faudrait aussi qu'on se lave les mains une bonne dizaine de fois. Si ce n'est plus. »

languages.text: "Tuhaf... Minik seslerim konuşmayı kesti. Şimdiyse gidip bir şeye dokunduğun her seferde sessizce kıkırdıyorlar. Geri dönüp ellerimizi sabunla on kez filan yıkasak nasıl olur?"
languages.original_text: "Weird... my little voices have shut up. Now they're just giggling quietly every time you go to touch something. How about we head back and wash our hands with soap ten times or so?"
